languages.text:
Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Позволяет контролировать ближайший торпедный залп, выпущенный в другом ходу, и перенаправить его за 5 ОПП.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, 1–3 раунда.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Allows to control the nearest torpedo salvo, granting it 5 MP. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Gives control of the nearest torpedo salvo, granting it 5 MP. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Позволяет контролировать ближайший {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}торпедный залп{/g}, выпущенный в другом ходу, и перенаправить его за 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ОПП{/g}.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

Gibt Kontrolle über die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}Torpedosalve{/g} und gewährt ihr 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}LBP{/g}. Funktioniert nur bei Torpedosalven, die während eines anderen Zugs abgefeuert wurden.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(von 1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Gibt Kontrolle über die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}Torpedosalve{/g} und gewährt ihr 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Funktioniert nur bei Torpedosalven, die während eines anderen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} abgefeuert wurden.
<indent=5 %>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: zufällig 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Donne le contrôle de la {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salve de torpilles{/g} la plus proche, en lui accordant 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PDV{/g}. Fonctionne uniquement sur les salves de torpilles lancées lors d'un autre tour.
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Donne le contrôle de la {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salve de torpilles{/g} la plus proche, en lui accordant 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Fonctionne uniquement sur les salves de torpilles lancées lors d'un autre {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
控制最近发射的{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}鱼雷集群{/g}，使该鱼雷集群获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}。此能力无法对本回合发射的鱼雷集群生效。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
控制最近发射的{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}鱼雷集群{/g}，使该鱼雷集群获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。此能力无法对本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}发射的鱼雷集群生效。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}：随机一到三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
Permite controlar la {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva de torpedos{/g} más cercana y le proporciona 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PMV{/g}. Solo funciona con salvas de torpedos lanzadas durante otro turno.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Permite controlar la {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva de torpedos{/g} más cercana y le proporciona 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Solo funciona con salvas de torpedos lanzadas durante otro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
一番近くの{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}魚雷斉射{/g}をコントロールして、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}+5獲得する。別のターンに発射された魚雷斉射にのみ有効。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>1～3</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Gives control of the nearest {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}, granting it 5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}VMP{/g}. Only works on torpedo salvos that were launched on another turn.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
最も近くの{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}斉射魚雷{/g}を制御し、5{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を与える。別の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に発射された斉射魚雷にのみ使用可能。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム）</indent>
